评论详情: It’s really cute fits perfectly but the ends of the ribbons were fraying so I tried to melt the ends with a lighter it made it a little lumpy but then it was easier to put the ribbon in the loops

The skirt is EXTREMELY cute so I was heartbroken to find even the biggest size was too small for me. I didn't realize that it was a zipper skirt instead of a stretchy pull up one so I thought even if it was a little small, it would stretch a bit to accommodate. Nope, zipper on the size made it impossible to fit into no matter how bad I wanted to. If there was more bigger sizes I would absolutely get this skirt again. But until then, I have to find some sort of dupe.

Beautiful, looks like a good fabric. Well constructed but too short. Not suitable for a teenage body. Preferable for 10 to 13 years better than 14 and over. My girl is 15, Xsmall size and it was extremely short in the back. Sadly  I had to return it .
Literally it fits like a glove but anytime i tried walking i always had to pull the skirt down. I picked the perfect size but it just rides up . Looks exactly like the picture !

I got a large as that's my normal size. It has stretch thank God, but it’s still a little too tight. I can wear it but I wish it was looser. Material is as expected, not see through. Style looks just like pic. May return for bigger size if they have xl.
Extra-large barely fit over my knees. Like, this might be an XL for a cabbage patch kid.
